area_name: G.O.A.T. Crag deep water solo, The

content.description: Right side of DWS crag. Shorter and chossier. No true top out 2/2 mankiness up above. Needs cleaning up. Start right and move up and left to prow.
content.location: Right side of crag deeper into small cove.

content.description: First obvious line you’ll come to approaching from the south east. 60+ feet deep for your boat. Start on the obvious ledge and work your way up and right. Top out through the mank for full send points.
Middle obvious line. Starts bottom right on ledge and moves up and left through blue streak. Moderately chossy. Top out through the mank for full send.
content.location: Middle line. Starts on ledge out of water. Moves up and left.

pathTokens: G.O.A.T. Crag deep water solo, The

content.description: Small DWS area on Watt’s Bar. Near Wann Bluff. On Goat island. Due west of Euchee marina. Decent 15 feet tall or so. Stone ranges from ok to chossy. Needs cleaning up. But better than nothing. Just pull your boat up and go! 60+ feet deep in main area, you and your boat should be fine.
